subtitle: We're sorry to see you go! Help us improve by sharing why you're unsubscribing.

privacyNotice.title: Privacy Notice
privacyNotice.description: Unsubscribing will remove your email from our newsletter list immediately. Your account and other services remain unaffected. You can resubscribe anytime from your account settings. We'll also send a notification to our team to help improve our newsletter.

preferencesNote: Changed your mind? You can always update your preferences instead.

success.feedbackMessage: Your input helps us improve our newsletter experience for everyone. While you won't receive our newsletters anymore, you're always welcome back!
